name: Eldritch Knight's vambraces, infused with protective magic
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has awesome armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
